original_text: Moreover he built cities in the mountains of Judah, and in the forests he built castles and towers.
korean_text: 유다 산중에 성읍들을 건축하며 수풀 가운데에 견고한 진영들과 망대를 건축하고

sentences.original_text: Moreover he built cities in the mountains of Judah
sentences.korean_translation: 더욱이 그는 유다 산악 지대에 도시들을 건설했다

sentences.original_text: and in the forests he built castles
